p: Among the 122 HAdV-7-positive cases identified in this study, 29 (23.8%) were related to upper respiratory tract infections (URIs; median age: 18 years), whereas 93 (76.2%) were related to lower respiratory tract infections (median age: 2 years). Moreover, 27 (22.1%) cases were related to severe pneumonia (median age: 1.2 years). No deaths were reported. HAdV-7 infections occurred throughout the year, and most cases were detected in January (23%; Table 3).
